Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
Transaction
public class Transaction extends Object
Represents a transaction in a vending machine, including details such as the item sold, price, payment, and change dispensed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Transaction()
    Constructs a new Transaction object with default values.
    Transaction(Item itemSold, double payment, double changeDispensed)
    Creates a new transaction with the specified item sold, payment, and change dispensed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction()
      Constructs a new Transaction object with default values. The item sold is set to null, price is set to 0, payment is set to 0, and change dispensed is set to 0.

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(Item itemSold, double payment, double changeDispensed)
      Creates a new transaction with the specified item sold, payment, and change dispensed.
      Parameters:
      itemSold - the item that was sold in the transaction
      payment - the payment made by the customer
      changeDispensed - the amount of change dispensed to the customer

  • Method Details

    • getItemSold

      public Item getItemSold()
      Returns the item that was sold in this transaction.
      Returns:
      the item sold in the transaction

      Sets the item that was sold in this transaction.
      Parameters:
      itemSold - the item sold in the transaction

      Returns the price of the item in this transaction.

    • setPayment
